text.elytratrails.category.elytra.@Toolt: Settings that affect your own trails.
text.elytratrails.category.others.@Toolt: Defaults used for other players/entities (unless overridden by packs).
text.elytratrails.category.server.@Toolt: Networking + safety limits for settings received from other players.
text.elytratrails.title: Elytra Contrails Mod Settings
text.elytratrails.option.enableAllTrails: Master toggle: enables/disables every trail type in the mod
text.elytratrails.option.translucentTrai: Lets trails use fading and alpha, but can cause issues with translucency sorting
text.elytratrails.option.Preset.@Tooltip: Preset that is selected will override "Your Trails" settings upon saving config
text.elytratrails.option.PresetOthers.@T: Preset that is selected will override "Other's Trails" settings upon saving config
text.elytratrails.option.export.@Tooltip: Exports above setting as a preset (located in config/elytratrails_presets) upon config saving. PRESET NAME IS REQUIRED FOR SAVING
text.elytratrails.option.exportPresetNam: Name for saved preset (required to save)
text.elytratrails.option.constantWidthOn: Makes width always the maxwidth, and applies width changes to transparency. ONLY WORKS WHEN TRANSLUCENT TRAILS IS TURNED ON
text.elytratrails.option.enableTwirls.@T: If turned on, you can twirl with the keybinds (look for them in Controls!)
text.elytratrails.option.alwaysShowTrail: Ignore Speed For Trail When Twirling
If turned on, trails will always show when twirling (ignores "speed dependent trail" settings)
text.elytratrails.option.firstPersonTwir: !!THIS OPTION CAN CAUSE MOTION SICKNESS!! Twirls Camera in first person when twirling
text.elytratrails.option.thirdPersonTwir: !!THIS OPTION CAN CAUSE MOTION SICKNESS!! Twirls Camera in third person when twirling
text.elytratrails.option.trailLifetime.@: How long the trail should stay for (seconds)
text.elytratrails.option.maxSamplePerSec: How many times the trails should sample position per second
text.elytratrails.option.speedDependentT: Only shows trails when flying at a certain speed (defined below)
text.elytratrails.option.trailMinSpeed.@: Speed at which to start showing trails (blocks per tick I think?)
text.elytratrails.option.trailMovesWithE: Whether the calculated wingtip should change based on the elytra's spread
text.elytratrails.option.enableParticles: Spawns particles around the player during flight, to show speed
text.elytratrails.option.particlesBlockR: Range in blocks to spawn particles
text.elytratrails.option.particlesVeloci: Amount "ahead" of you to particles in front of you
Multiple of player velocity to make particles move backwards
text.elytratrails.option.particle.@Toolt: Which particle should appear during flight
text.elytratrails.option.particleSpawnsP: How many particles should spawn per tick?
text.elytratrails.option.startRampDistan: How long should it take for trails to reach their max width?
text.elytratrails.option.endRampDistance: How long should it take for trails to reach width 0 from the end?
text.elytratrails.option.enableRandomWid: Should trails have a random factor in their width?
text.elytratrails.option.randomWidthVari: How much should width change based on randomness?
text.elytratrails.option.fadeStart.@Tool: Should the trail fade in at the start? (REQUIRES TRANSLUCENT TRAILS)
text.elytratrails.option.fadeStartDistan: How long should it take for the trail to fade in? (REQUIRES TRANSLUCENT TRAILS)
text.elytratrails.option.fadeEnd.@Toolti: Should the trail fade away at the end? (REQUIRES TRANSLUCENT TRAILS)
Should the trail interpolate between points to make it smoother?
text.elytratrails.option.firstPersonFade: Time for first person trails to fade in (seconds)
text.elytratrails.option.fadeFirstPerson: First person trails fade in with a delay to prevent annoyance
text.elytratrails.option.emfSupport.@Too: Having this on tries to make it work with EMF models, can cause issues
text.elytratrails.option.cameraDistanceF: Tries to fade trails close to camera to prevent annoyance
Maximum trail width accepted from other players (blocks)
text.elytratrails.option.maxOnlineLifeti: Maximum trail lifetime accepted from other players (seconds)
If enabled, uses trail settings received over the network for other players
text.elytratrails.option.shareTrail.@Too: If enabled, other users will see your trail settings
If disabled, they will see their default trail on you.
text.elytratrails.option.showTrailToOthe: If disabled, completely hide your trail from other players
text.elytratrails.option.useSameDefaults: If enabled, other entities use your 'Your Trails' settings instead of the 'Other's Trails' defaults
text.elytratrails.option.enableTrailOthe: Default: whether trails render for other entities/players
text.elytratrails.option.translucentTrai: Default: Lets trails use fading and alpha, but can cause issues with translucency sorting
text.elytratrails.option.wireframeTrails: Default: Makes trails wireframe (Is very thin!)
text.elytratrails.option.enableRandomWid: Default: should other trails have random width variation?
text.elytratrails.option.speedDependentT: Default: only show other trails when they are moving fast enough
text.elytratrails.option.trailMovesWithE: Default: whether other wingtips move with elytra angle
text.elytratrails.option.cameraDistanceF: Default: fade other trails when close to your camera
text.elytratrails.option.widthOthersDefa: Default max width for other trails (blocks)
text.elytratrails.option.trailMinSpeedOt: Default minimum speed for other trails to appear
text.elytratrails.option.startRampDistan: Default: distance for other trails to ramp up to max width
text.elytratrails.option.endRampDistance: Default: distance for other trails to ramp down to 0 width
text.elytratrails.option.colorOthersDefa: Default color for other trails as hex (example: #FFFFFF)
text.elytratrails.option.clearTrails.@To: Clears all trails on config saving
Shaders on makes certain translucent trails glow, to prevent weird visuals
text.elytratrails.option.randomWidthVari: Default: amount randomness affects other trail width
text.elytratrails.option.fadeStartOthers: Default: Should the trail fade in at the start? (REQUIRES TRANSLUCENT TRAILS)
text.elytratrails.option.fadeStartDistan: Default: How long should it take for the trail to fade in? (REQUIRES TRANSLUCENT TRAILS)
text.elytratrails.option.fadeEndOthersDe: Default: Should the trail fade away at the end? (REQUIRES TRANSLUCENT TRAILS)
text.elytratrails.option.resourcePackOve: If enabled, resource pack trail configs can override player trails too (falls back to synced/default settings if none exist).
text.elytratrails.option.prideTrail.@Too: Pride flag/Trail texture. Leave blank to disable. Example: rainbow, transgender.  Add new ones into assets/elytratrails/textures/trails
text.elytratrails.option.prideTrailOther: Default Pride flag/Trail texture. Leave blank to disable. Example: rainbow, transgender.  Add new ones into assets/elytratrails/textures/trails
text.elytratrails.category.elytra.desc: Applies to your own trails (elytra + first-person behavior).
text.elytratrails.category.elytra.desc.e: If "Export as Preset" is turned on, it will export to config/elytratrails_presets when you save this config. You can then later apply it in the Presets settings tab. YOU NEED TO GIVE THE PRESET A NAME.
text.elytratrails.category.server.desc: Server syncing (only works if the mod exists on the server!)
text.elytratrails.category.others.desc: Defaults for other entities/players (Defaults for players unless synced with the server)
text.elytratrails.category.particles.des: Optional particle effects while flying. (Fun fact: this was the original intention of this mod)
text.elytratrails.category.presets.desc: Load presets for YOUR trails. If a preset is selected below, it will override "Your Trails" settings when you save this config.
Load presets for OTHER's trails. If a preset is selected below, it will override "Other's Trails" settings when you save this config.
